void.string: Calls creature to fight for you.
One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

As summon nature's ally I, except that you can summon one 9th-level creature, 1d3 8th-level creatures of the same type, or 1d4+1 lower level creatures of the same type. When you use a summoning spell to summon an air, chaotic, earth, evil, fire, good, lawful, or water creature, it is a spell of that type. 9th Level
* Elemental, elder * Pixie [can cast Otto's irresistible dance, neutral good]
